info.description: A restful api for Star Wars Data
info.title: StarWarX Swagger

get.description: Endpoint for all the characters of the Star Wars universe

parameters.description: An array of ids for specific entity retrieval
parameters.name: Ids

parameters.description: An array of ids whereby only the entity id will be returned
parameters.name: IdsToSkip

parameters.description: An integer for the number of items per page
parameters.name: ItemsPerPage

parameters.description: A string for the order by which the entities should be returned

eyeColorsCount.description: Sorts by the number of different eye colors

hairColorsCount.description: Sorts by the number of different hair colors

skinColorsCount.description: Sorts by the number of different skin colors

parameters.name: OrderBy

parameters.description: An integer for the page that should be returned
parameters.name: Page
